short_summary: Estimated quantity of commodity: 48. Duration of contract: 2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31.
description: Public Procurement Notice. Request for proposal to purchase 48 Valves, Nonpowered, 24 each at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax, with delivery time frame of April 1 2023 to March 31 2024. Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
================================

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice

#### Solicitation Number
W8482-230973/B

#### Closing Date
2023-01-17T14:00:00

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (Eng)
Demande de Propositions (Fra)

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding (Eng)
Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Fra)

### Request Summary

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites sealed bids for the procurement of safety relief valves, as outlined below.

**Item 1**
Designation: VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF
NSN: 01-210-4144
Quantity: 24 units
Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt

**Item 2**
Designation: VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF
NSN: 01-210-4144
Quantity: 24 units
Delivery Location: CFB Halifax

#### Product Specifications

Bidders must submit products that meet the following specifications:

* Part Number: YB2385D225
* NCAGE: 35975

Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substitute Product must provide the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE.

### Contractual Requirements

* Estimated quantity of commodities: 48
* Contract duration: 2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31
* Delivery timeframe: 2023-04-01 to 2024-03-31

### Bid Submission

* Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Bids in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Jean-Pierre Normandin
Directorate Maritime Procurement
101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
Phone: 819-939-3674
Fax: Not Available

### Procurement Documents

The Request for Proposal document can be accessed at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

### Notice of Proposed Procurement

The DND reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
